sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>Cost of technical and engineering support including sustaining engineering and management support for systems and equipment, afloat and ashore, from completion of installation through end of life-cycle. Responsibilities include: Fleet Engineering Support, Configuration Management & Product Engineering Support, Help Desk, Maintenance Engineering Support, Performance & Maintenance Data Analysis, Repair Facilities, Life-Cycle Test Support, Training & Manning, Warranty Management. This element is a roll-up of costs associated with lower levels.</definition> <number>GWBS0001440</number> <parent_task display_value="4 Operations and Support">eb158176db91a3008e9357935e96199e</parent_task> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2b158176db91a3008e9357935e9619a6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:53:45</sys_updated_on> <task_code>4.7</task_code> <task_name>4.7 In Service Engineering Activity (ISEA)</task_name> <task_title>In Service Engineering Activity (ISEA)</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
